name: places/ChIJ0dLHf4xYwokRwH0fSjpDIUM
formattedAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Rosenberg for over 10 year. He is consistently through in his exams and diagnoses and his bed side manners are top notch.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Rosenberg for over 10 year. He is consistently through in his exams and diagnoses and his bed side manners are top notch.

originalText.text: Dr Rosenberg has been my doctor for over 13 years and will never leave him. Personable and thorough and overall great guy and physician.

text.text: Dr Rosenberg has been my doctor for over 13 years and will never leave him. Personable and thorough and overall great guy and physician.

originalText.text:
EDIT: as of late, when I contact this practice, I get no response at all, or a response that doesn't answer my clearly outlined question. When I request a response from the doctor, 9 times out of 10, I'm ignored. Disappointing as Dr. Rosenberg claims he is happy to work with his patients and meet their needs, but that hasn't been my experience for quite some time now. I've kept the original review so you can clearly see how much my opinion has changed.

ORIGINAL: I hope Dr. Rosenberg never retires, because he's great. Truly cares about his patients, very responsive. I would recommend him to anyone and everyone.

originalText.text: Friendly, thorough and answered my questions. I appreciated the short wait and the guidance Dr Rosenberg provided

text.text: Friendly, thorough and answered my questions. I appreciated the short wait and the guidance Dr Rosenberg provided

originalText.text: Dr. Rosenberg is the best. Smart. Thorough. Caring. Great bedside manner. All of the things.
